trivia.GameMode

Uses of GameMode in trivia
 

Subclasses of GameMode in trivia
 class EndGame
          Displays all post-game information and allows player to return to Main Menu.
 class Instructions
          Displays the instructions for play and offers a button to go to MainMenu.
 class MainGame
          Pulls questions from text files based on which categories are selected.
 class MainMenu
          Allows player to select which categories to pull questions from.
 class Sandbox
          A mode used for testing of new features.
 

Methods in trivia with parameters of type GameMode

          Sets the current game mode.
